languages.text: "Сетовать на веленье судьбы — равно что сечь океан пустоты за бортом флагмана. Среди звезд, среди жизни и смерти слово твое — мне приказ. Достойно принять его — долг мой перед тобой и Неумирающим".

"There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."
languages.original_text: "Сетовать на веленье судьбы — равно что сечь океан пустоты за бортом флагмана. Среди звезд, среди жизни и смерти слово твое — мне приказ. Достойно принять его — долг мой перед тобой и Неумирающим".

traits.locale_text: "To lament over the will of fate is akin to flogging the void ocean around the flagship. Whether your word is spoken among the stars, in life, or in death, it is my command. To accept it with dignity is my duty to you and the Undying One."

"To lament over the will of fate is akin to flogging the void ocean around the flagship. Whether your word is spoken among the stars, in life, or in death, it is my command. To accept it with dignity is my duty to you and the Undying One."

"There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Here among the stars, your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."

"There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."

languages.text: «Lamentarse por las vicisitudes del destino es una tarea fútil, una necedad comparable a atacar el océano del vacío mismo. Su palabra es mi ley tanto en la vida como en la muerte. Aceptarla con dignidad es mi deber hacia usted y hacia el Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentarse por las vicisitudes del destino es una tarea fútil, una necedad comparable a atacar el océano del vacío mismo. Su palabra es mi ley tanto en la vida como en la muerte. Aceptarla con dignidad es mi deber hacia usted y hacia el Inmortal».

languages.text: 「運命の意思を嘆いても意味はない。虚空の海そのものを攻撃することに等しい愚かな行為よ。あなたの言葉は、生の中でも死の中でも、私にとっては命令なの。凛として受け入れることが、あなたと不死の者に対する私の務めだわ」
languages.original_text: "There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."

traits.locale_text: 「運命の意思を嘆いても意味はない。虚空の海そのものを攻撃することに等しい愚かな行為よ。あなたの言葉は、生の中でも死の中でも、私にとっては命令なの。凛として受け入れることが、あなたと不死の者に対する私の務めだわ」

languages.text: “哀叹命运的意志毫无意义。这种行为非常愚蠢，堪比攻击虚无之海本身。无论生死，你的话语就是我的命令。我要怀着尊严接受一切，这便是我对你和不死之神应付的责任。”
languages.original_text: "There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."

traits.locale_text: “哀叹命运的意志毫无意义。这种行为非常愚蠢，堪比攻击虚无之海本身。无论生死，你的话语就是我的命令。我要怀着尊严接受一切，这便是我对你和不死之神应付的责任。”

languages.text: "Es ist sinnlos, über den Willen des Schicksals zu lamentieren. Ebenso dumm wie ein Angriff auf den Leerenozean selbst. Euer Wort ist mein Befehl im Leben wie im Tod. Es ist meine Pflicht gegenüber Euch und dem Todlosen, das mit Würde zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist sinnlos, über den Willen des Schicksals zu lamentieren. Ebenso dumm wie ein Angriff auf den Leerenozean selbst. Euer Wort ist mein Befehl im Leben wie im Tod. Es ist meine Pflicht gegenüber Euch und dem Todlosen, das mit Würde zu akzeptieren."

languages.text: « Rien ne sert de déplorer la volonté du destin. C'est aussi vain que d'attaquer l'océan du vide lui-même. Vos désirs sont des ordres, dans la vie comme dans la mort. Mon devoir envers vous et l'Immortel est de l'accepter avec dignité. »
languages.original_text: "There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."

traits.locale_text: « Rien ne sert de déplorer la volonté du destin. C'est aussi vain que d'attaquer l'océan du vide lui-même. Vos désirs sont des ordres, dans la vie comme dans la mort. Mon devoir envers vous et l'Immortel est de l'accepter avec dignité. »

languages.original_text: "There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."

languages.text: "Kaderin iradesinden yakınmanın ne anlamı var? Uçsuz okyanusuna savaş açmak kadar aptallık olur. Hem yaşamda hem de ölümde emrin neyse o olur. Emrine haysiyetimle razı olmak, sana ve Ölmeyen'e olan vazifemdir."
languages.original_text: "There is no purpose in lamenting the will of fate. It is an act of foolishness comparable to attacking the void ocean itself. Your word is my command in life and in death. It is my duty to you and the Undying One to accept it with dignity."
